a value curve to be used by heuristics

application name, provided while registering a new experiment

job identifier, provided while registering a new experiment

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: 1. Get status report
name: GetStatus
description: Returns available data that was previously stored in the database. The body of the response is user-specific, and can represent any valid JSON document.

title: 1. Create/Update status report
name: PutStatus
description: Create or update a status report for the given workflow and experiment. The body of the request is user-specific, and can include any valid JSON document.

title: 2. Get information about a specific workflow
name: GetWorkflow

body.description: References a registered workflow by its ID
Author name if provided while registering a new workflow
List of individual tasks the workflow is composed of
Range of CPU cores used for executing the task on

Error 4xx.description: Given ID does not refer to a workflow.

examples.title: Error-Response:

name: GetWorkflows

Success 200.description: References a registered workflow by its ID

name: PutWorkflow

Parameter.description: References a registered workflow by its ID
Author name if provided while registering a new workflow
List of individual tasks the workflow is composed of
Range of CPU cores used for executing the task on

Success 200.description: Unique ID of the experiment associated with the workflow
